description:
Did you ever wonder about the importance of Microsoft Excel is in today's job market? Many jobs require basic to intermediate level skills in Excel. From office administration jobs to VP, CEO- everyone is using Microsoft Excel these days. An office cannot function without the convenience of Microsoft Excel.

This course is designed for absolute beginners who wish to have the skills that will make them Microsoft Excel 2016 gurus at work.

Microsoft Excel is EVERYWHERE! It is installed in over 800 millions computers and is used in almost every businesses in the world. You can use Excel for Data Analysis, Printable Reports, Custom Forms, Calculations, Data Management, Budgeting and more.

In this course, I will introduce you to the Excel interface, terminologies, formulas and formatting tools. The course will also cover three very useful Excel based projects that will expand your knowledge of application.
title: Learn Microsoft Excel In Less Than 2 Hours
